name: CSI Mission Hospital Kulasekharam
description: Located in a hilly area infested with malaria is the third hospital opened by Dr. Thomson in a building donated by the Government. What was previously a salt store-house was remodeled into a hospital and opened on October 26, 1881. Additional rooms, a Maternity ward and a deep well were later constructed. A government hospital was started nearby and the hospital had to be shut down temporarily between 1954 to 1960. It was reopened and further expanded and an X-ray laboratory was opened as well. The hospital proved very useful especially to the labourers of the various rubber estates in the locality. Various Community Health centres in multiple villages were opened which offered medical counseling and promoted health awareness.
address: SH 90, Kulasekharam, Tamil Nadu 629161

name: Valliammai Achi Hospital
description: The Hospital named in the memory of Valliammai Achi is one of the earliest Institutions of Philanthropy established in 1982 in Kanyakumari District. It serves a vast population comprising the employees and dependants of New Ambadi Estates and other surrounding villages. The Hospital has expanded its activities with special clinics and In-patient care. VAH also caters to the medical needs of the unreached tribal community through a Mobile Medical Van. The hospital reaches out to about 5000 patients in a month through its OP services and about 1500 patients a moth though its MHV services.
address: Valliammai Achi Hospital, Kadayalumoodu, Kaliyal 629 101, Tamil Nadu
